title: Spiral - Skull Blast - Hoody Black
features: Ever feel so much pressure building up inside your brain that you’re worried it might explode? Scorching hot magma and flame erupts from within this demonic skull, splintering it into a million fragments and scattering them to the wind.

Ever feel so much pressure building up inside your brain that you’re worried it might explode? Scorching hot magma and flame erupts from within this demonic skull, splintering it into a million fragments and scattering them to the wind.
Hoody Black is made of Top Quality 100% Cotton, Fleece using skin friendly, Azo-free, Reactive dyes.
Spiral is a long-established brand specialising in heavy metal and gothic fashion, with men’s and women’s gothic clothing.
Spiral artwork covers a range of themes from tribal designs, gothic, horror, fantasy and fetish to the more commercial vintage, fashion and distressed, screen printed to last.
Just one of the unique from a huge range of Alternative Fashion products from Spiral!
